# Intro
Awaiting the start of my second year...

![](Siamese-Cat.jpg)


```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(tidygraph)
library(ggraph)
library(igraph)
library(igraphdata)
```

```{r}

data("karate")
karate

karate %>% ggraph(., layout = "graphopt") + 
  geom_edge_link0(aes(width = weight)) + 
  geom_node_point(aes(color = color), size = 4)

```
